messages.message: This may be by design, but want to highlight it just in case. I like to have multiple tabs open with instances of AI Hub for demo purposes, and I am frequently logged in on different instances (e.g. an unlimited prod email instance, a regular gmail instance). This always worked fine, but now I seem to be getting logged out from my original instance on tab 1 when I log in on another instance on tab 2. I can work around it, but it is a little annoying.
do you know if this is expected? @Xindi Xu

@Bas do you have the tabs open in different windows? ie 1 tab in a normal window, 1 tab in an incognito window

if the tabs are open in the same window, i assume the behavior youâ€™re seeing is expected
You have to use different browsers (or browser profiles in chrome). Essentially, the same browser will use the same session cookie, which is used by the backend to know which user you are using.
For example. I have different browser profiles for different persona (org admin, org user, site admin, community user, etc).
ok, makes sense. Thanks for the quick feedback!
